          <title>
            <string language="en">Electromagnetic radiation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektromagnetische Strahlung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Rayonnement électromagnétique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Radiação eletromagnética</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Radiazione elettromagnetica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηλεκτρομαγνητική ακτινοβολία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Radiación electromágnetica</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram show the different kinds of electromagnetic radiation in increasing frequency and wavelength.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electromagnetic radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Frequency</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Gamma rays</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">infrared radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Microwaves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Radio waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ultraviolet radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wavelength</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">x rays</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagrammerscheinen die unterschiedlichen 
Arten der elektromagnetischen Strahlung in zunehmender Frequenz und in
Wellenlänge.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette exposition de diagramme les différents 
genres de rayonnement électromagnétique dans la fréquence et la 
longueur d'onde croissantes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta mostra do diagrama os tipos diferentes da 
radiação eletromagnética na freqüência e no wavelength 
crescentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa esposizione dello schema i generi 
differenti di radiazione elettromagnetica nella frequenza e nella 
lunghezza d'onda aumentanti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει διαφορετικά είδη 
ηλεκτρομαγνητικής ακτινοβολίας στην αυξανόμενα συχνότητα και το 
μήκος κύματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta demostración del diagrama las diversas 
clases de radiación electromágnetica en frecuencia y longitud de 
onda de aumento.</string>
          </description>
